ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Deity specific items
ygData.msgSnippet: There are some interesting quests out there for sure.  Another item for our ranged slot for those who can t cough up the plat for a runed bone fork. The Kerran
ygData.messageBody:
There are some interesting quests out there for sure. Another item for our
ranged slot for those who can't cough up the plat for a runed bone fork.
The Kerran Toy is AC:3, +2 AGI, All/All and goes into the ranged slot.
Curiously there is another bracer quest, but the guy you have to kill to get
the bracer is at least a 30th level Paladin. For that level of opposition
the bracer is a joke, not even as good as the Bracer of Erollisi.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Lonnie Lewis [mailto:llewis@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 1:26 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Deity specific items


I've only heard of one new item that was diety specific, but I think it was
a quest from the new Kerra Isle.

But I think the purpose was for newer items, not to change old items.

Bien

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Webber, Jessica [SMTP:webber@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 3:01 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Deity specific items
>
> Anyone hear any more on this? I check a bracer of Erollisi last night
> figuring if the change affected current items that that would surely be
> one
> of them. My agnostic rogue had no problem wearing it nor did it say
> anything about deity when I right clicked it.
>
> Peace
> Evulia, bard of 10 verses, Tunare
